Hope Gala  Chairman Sean Shapiro shared photos from The Hope Galas appearance on national television Tuesday morning PERIOD

Shapiro and other volunteers for The Hope Gala  a third annual dinner fundraiser in New York City benefiting The Four Diamonds Fund  were interviewed by weatherwoman Marysol Castro on The Early Show on CBS Tuesday morning PERIOD

This years Hope Gala will be held on January   at New York Citys Capitale PERIOD Penn State quarterbacks coach Jay Paterno will be emceeing the event with guest speaker Matthew Zachary CEO and founder of the Im Too Young For This Cancer Foundation PERIOD
